mapper.insert:
insert into sys_user (
id,
username,
password,
salt,
disabled,
create_time,
update_time,
) values (
#{id},
#{username},
#{password},
#{salt},
#{disabled},
#{createTime},
#{updateTime},
)

insert ignore into sys_user (
id,
username,
password,
salt,
disabled,
create_time,
update_time,
) values (
#{id},
#{username},
#{password},
#{salt},
#{disabled},
#{createTime},
#{updateTime},
)

update_time=values(update_time),

mapper.update:
update sys_user set
id = #{id},
username = #{username},
password = #{password},
salt = #{salt},
disabled = #{disabled},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}

update sys_user set
id = #{id},
username = #{username},
password = #{password},
salt = #{salt},
disabled = #{disabled},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
, version = version + 1 where id = #{id}

update.foreach:
update sys_user set
id = #{ pojo.id },
username = #{ pojo.username },
password = #{ pojo.password },
salt = #{ pojo.salt },
disabled = #{ pojo.disabled },
create_time = #{ pojo.createTime },
update_time = #{ pojo.updateTime },
where
id = #{ pojo.id }

mapper.delete:
delete from sys_user where
id in
#{item}
and
id = #{id} and
username in
#{item}
and
username = #{username} and
password in
#{item}
and
password = #{password} and
salt in
#{item}
and
salt = #{salt} and
disabled in
#{item}
and
disabled = #{disabled} and
create_time in
#{item}
and
create_time = #{createTime} and
update_time in
#{item}
and
update_time = #{updateTime} and

sql.trim: id as "id", username as "username", password as "password", salt as "salt", disabled as "disabled", create_time as "createTime", update_time as "updateTime",

choose.otherwise: id as "id", username as "username", password as "password", salt as "salt", disabled as "disabled", create_time as "createTime", update_time as "updateTime",

inParams != null and inParams.username != null and inParams.username.size() > 0
inParams != null and inParams.password != null and inParams.password.size() > 0
inParams != null and inParams.salt != null and inParams.salt.size() > 0
inParams != null and inParams.disabled != null and inParams.disabled.size() > 0
inParams != null and inParams.createTime != null and inParams.createTime.size() > 0
inParams != null and inParams.updateTime != null and inParams.updateTime.size() > 0
